cta.audit: Start with the 2-3 day MVP Plan
cta.mvpPrompt: I want to book a call to discuss your MVP services.
cta.aiSprintPrompt: I want to book a call to discuss your AI Sprint services.

guarantee.text: Guarantee: if we miss the agreed success metric or deadline because of me, I keep working at no extra cost until it's met. Bug-fix safety net after launch included.
